short.ar: Falling Fruits هي لعبة ألغاز مستوحاة من عام 2048. يجمع اللاعبون قطع الفاكهة عن طريق تحريكها حول الشبكة.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Falling Fruits is a puzzle game inspired by 2048. Players combine fruit tiles by sliding them around the grid.
Falling Fruits is a fun and addictive HTML5 game inspired by the popular game 2048. In the game, players present with a grid of fruit tiles. And must combine them by sliding them around the grid. When two fruit tiles of the same type touch, they will merge into a single tile with a higher value.
The game's objective is to create the highest-valued fruit tile possible by combining as many fruit tiles. As players progress through the game, new fruit tiles will fall from the top of the screen. Making it more challenging to create high-valued tiles. To succeed, players must think strategically and plan their moves carefully.
One of the critical features of Falling Fruits is its intuitive and easy-to-use controls. Players can slide the fruit tiles around the grid using arrow keys or swiping on their touchscreen device. This allows for fast and fluid gameplay that is easy to pick up and play.
In addition to the standard game mode, Falling Fruits also includes a variety of challenging levels and game modes to keep players coming back for more. In the Puzzle mode, players must use their strategic thinking skills to solve increasingly tricky levels. Endlessly, players must stay alive for as long as possible, combining fruit tiles as quickly as possible to keep the grid from filling up.
Overall, Falling Fruits is a fun and addictive HTML5 game that keeps players entertained for hours. Its challenging gameplay, various game modes, and easy-to-use controls make it a must-play for anyone looking for a brain-teasing and engaging game.
